short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TourConnect extension provides access to your TourConnect tools right at your webmail platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As a Travel-AI client, with this extension you will be able to enter stop sales, offers and preview partner information right from Gmail, you can also open the sidebar while browsing any other website; learn what Travel-ML can do for your company at https://www.tourconnect.com/travel-ml/
